title: Vidifont / Circa 1960-70 CBS NEWS 36 FONT
content:
This is a tough one to track down. But this is the font used in the 'vidifont' on screen text generators, on CBS way back when.

I have searched the normal circles and haven't really come across anything.  
Any recommendations?
